about_the_game:
Tales of Tirunia is a turn-based strategy game which rewards careful placement and future thinking. Every placement of your units on the board can be the masterstroke that drags the entire game in your favor– or it can leave you open to a critical counterstroke by enemy forces. Units that are overpowered by attacks from surrounding enemies flip allegiance– and can chain those attacks onwards across the entire board. Special abilities for each faction– the raw damage-boosting of the Wild Terins or the cursed power of the Bog Fiends– create tense tactical situations.

FEATURES

  • Explore a lore-deep story-mode, leading your chosen army through the adventure of the great life-god Annu’s downfall, and its dark consequences… or hop into intense PVP, testing your strategic skills against other players. Prove your mastery!

  • Multiple armies with distinctive playstyles and interactions means that there is no limit to what you can learn and discover on Tirunia. Will you fight as the untamed Wild Terins, boasting raw power and simple, brutal abilities, or as their more “civilized” High Terin counterparts, focusing on area lockdown? Will you emerge from the fog with the decay-timer-based Bog Fiends? Take the time to master each army and unlock their full potential as you fight your way across the island!

  • The right placement can turn your enemy’s most powerful unit– and its devastating abilities– to your own advantage. The wrong placement can leave your entire army up for grabs. Outwit your opponents to achieve true dominance over the board!

CHOOSE YOUR WAY TO PLAY

Battle through Tales of Tirunia’s story mode, taking each army in turn as the greater plot of the island’s fate, and the planet’s with it, unfolds. Or hop into PVP and prove your mastery against online opponents. Choose your favorite army from the High Terins and Wild Terins, the accursed Bog Fiends, the strange command-based Hive army, or the endlessly evolving Radiants– find the perfect strategies for your playstyle! New armies and game-modes will be continuously added, so there will always be new ways to play!

MASTER A SUBTLE BOARD-CONTROL SYSTEM

Wherever a unit is placed, it attacks neighboring enemies, with different combat values in each direction; a higher value than the opponent means that control of the enemy unit, its abilities, and its board-space is flipped. Different units have different chaining capabilities, sometimes causing the effects of one placement to ripple all the way from one end of the board to the other– and the most powerful units have devastating special abilities that define their armies and change the flow of play. 

THE TREASURE AND SECRETS OF TERINIA ARE UP FOR GRABS!

Once thought to be just a mythical story for children, the island of Terinia has suddenly reemerged onto the surface of the planet. Hidden away from the rest of the universe for centuries, the island has developed a powerful civilization in the High Terins, capable of wielding arcane magic and technology. But the forests and plains are stalked by the Wild Terins, savage and bestial. With the rest of the world suddenly pouring in to claim this rediscovered territory and its powerful resources, who will finally rise to gain full control of Tirunia?

short_description: Tales of Tirunia is a turn-based strategy game focused on turning your enemy’s own units against them and chaining attacks to take as much area as possible! Choose your army, master your faction’s special abilities, and use your skills to claim the board!
